/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene day in a rural area of Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, which is a clear, bright blue with a few scattered clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. 

In the foreground, there's a dirt road that stretches out into the distance. On the left side of the road, there's a line of trees standing tall, their green leaves contrasting with the brown of the road. On the right side of the road, power lines stretch out, following the path of the road. 

Further down the road, a few buildings can be seen, their details slightly blurred due to the distance. The overall scene is peaceful and idyllic, a typical day in a rural area of Beijing.
